about_the_game:
⚔️ FEATURES ⚔️

✒️ Strategic card-based combat with otherworldly beasts and epic challenges.
✒️ A unique mix of deckbuilding and RPG.
✒️ Over 250 Cards, that can be used alone or chained into unlockable combos.
✒️ Roguelike traverse and non-linear exploration, throughout the world of paper and ink.
✒️ City building and resource management.
✒️ Wide collection of cards and powers to unlock.
✒️ Huge replayability thanks to carefully designed procedural generation.
✒️ Thread your path with care, as each step comes with both a reward and a price to pay.
✒️ Pay attention to the Chronicles or face the consequences of overwriting!
✒️ Made in collaboration with the award-winning board game designer Jamey Stegmaier - the mastermind behind such masterpieces as Scythe, Charterstone, and Viticulture.

⚔️ OVERVIEW ⚔️

『 You find yourself trapped in a twisted, origami world, full of mysterious creatures, brought to life - by an unknown force.

『 With the help of the legendary writers of the past and powered by your persistence, fight your way through the darkened landscape and solve the tragic mystery, one battle at a time.

『 Your deck of cards is your arsenal of abilities, but their full potential has yet to be unlocked.

『 Thankfully you have a safe haven - the Town. Where you can repurpose acquired treasures, and expand and enhance its structures to aid you on your dark journey.

『 There is only one way out - forward. And you refuse to stop.
As you are the Teller of the Tale, written in ink and blood.
You are... Inkborn!

⚔️ FEATURES ⚔️

✒️ Strategic card-based combat with otherworldly beasts and epic challenges.
✒️ A unique mix of deckbuilding and RPG.

✒️ Huge replayability thanks to carefully designed procedural generation.
✒️ Thread your path with care, as each step comes with both a reward and a price to pay.
✒️ Pay attention to the Chronicles or face the consequences of overwriting!
✒️ Made in collaboration with the award-winning board game designer Jamey Stegmaier - the mastermind behind such masterpieces as Scythe, Charterstone, and Viticulture.

『 You find yourself trapped in a twisted, origami world, full of mysterious creatures, brought to life - by an unknown force.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 / Intel Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

name: Inkborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A roguelike, deckbuilder game with a twist, tactical combat, and huge replayability. Collect cards, traverse the dark lands, battle elusive enemies, and grow your town - as you push deeper into the chasm of madness. You are the hero and the writer of this tale. And you write with ink and with blood.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
